Login.Blurb: We are ready here to help you to with GDPR compliance. Our chat support is open this week Monday to Friday from 10:00 - 16:00
Login.CompanyNumbRequired: Tên đăng nhập là bắt buộc
Login.FreeSupport: Free support when you need it
Login.DocumentationText: We know that personal data law can be a tricky subject and that you might need some additional information. Please visit our help center for more documentation on GDPR law and rules.
Login.CallUsText: You are always welcome to call us on (+45) 71 96 96 73, however if the waiting time is too long, please us our chat function in the bottom of the screen, then we will get back to you as soon as possible.
Login.TryToChatText: If you have questions or need to get in touch with us, please use our chat function that you find in the bottom left corner of the screen. We are online weekdays between 10:00 and 16:00 CET.
Login.VideosText: You can find short videos in our help center, explaining the wizard flow. You can also find articles in the helpcenter concerning the most commonly used functions on the platform.
Login.IncorrectLogin: Incorrect account number, username or password. Please try again.
Login.UnauthorizedRole: Your role is not authorized to access this application. Please contact our support.
Login.UserLockedOut: Your account is temporarily locked out. Please try again later.
Login.UserDeactivated: Your account is disabled. Please contact your administrator.
Login.EmailNotConfirmed: Please check your mailbox and follow the instruction there to confirm your email address.
Login.no_subscription: You have not subscribed to our services, or your trial has expired. Please subscribe to one of our billing plans to continue your access.
Login.no_payment: Your trial has expired. Please update your payment method to continue your access.
Login.expired: Your subscription has expired. Please update your payment method to continue your access.
Login.SubsriptionExpiredForPerformerReviewer: Your company subscription has expired. Please contact your company account owner for further information.
Login.ResendEmailSuccess: A new confirmation e-mail has been sent to your inbox. Please check the e-mail and follow the activation link.
Login.ResendEmailFailed: We encountered an error when we tried to resend the account confirmation to you. Please check your e-mail adress and try again.
Login.InvalidToken: The activation URL is not valid. Please contact us for support.

SignUp.SignUpFormTitle: Try ComplyTo GDPR free for 14 days
SignUp.SignUpFormSubTitle: Fill out the form to try our tool already today - no string attached.
SignUp.PasswordInvalid: At least one number, one uppercase letter and at least 6 characters (currently we do not accept special signs)
SignUp.Accepted: I have read and accepted the
SignUp.ExpriesAutomaticallyText: When you signup to ComplyTo you are asked for your user details only.  Your free trial starts when you signup and you will only be asked to fill in your credit card details should you wish to continue your access to ComplyTo after the first 14 days.
SignUp.FreeSupportText: Contacting our support is free for our customers, as well as using our online help center
SignUp.VideosDemosText: No one want to read page after page of instructions or manuals. Consequently we have produced small videos that guides you through the functionality
SignUp.DuplicateUserName: Your email has been registered already.
SignUp.SuccessSignUp: You have signed up successfully. An email has been sent to your email address. Please check it out and verify your email.
SignUp.DeleteUnSuccess: Deleted un-sucessfully. Please make sure delete all data
SignUp.AccountOwnerExisted: Email is already connected to another accounts as the 'Account owner'

ResetPass.EmailNoExist: The Email does not exist or is not confirmed.

Manage.MaximumNumberError: Sorry, you have reached the maximum number of users. Please upgrade your subscription plan, or purchase an add-on for additional users.
Manage.UserSeatLeft: The number of free user seats left on your current plan
Manage.Failed: Sorry, we can not activate your account. Please contact us for quick support.
Manage.ChangeOwnershipMessage: Are you sure you want to transfer the ownership to this user?
Manage.AlreadyOwner: Sorry. We are not able to transfer the ownership since this user already owns another account.

MobileAlert.Title: Sorry, mobile devices are not supported
MobileAlert.Text1: We are making GDPR as simple as possible, but it just ain't good on small screens.
MobileAlert.Text2: For the best experience please login again from either a Desktop browser or Tablet device.
